title: Can anyone think of any good skin concepts for Illaoi?
body: Right off the bat I can already envision her skin as a wrestler.

replies.body: Car salesman with wobbly inflateables was a hood suggestion.
YEEEEEEEEES! Riot pls give this man a cookie. I can see that happening as a April Fool's day release.

I saw a really cool post on an Instagram account that does League of Legends skin concepts (@lol_skin.concepts):

https://instagram.com/p/BRDhMuulJRl/

-Elderwood Illaoi
   -Branches/roots/thorns instead of tentacles
   -This is my personal favorite, as it meshes with her theme and would have the effect of being enveloped by the forest. Particles would look great.
-Gatekeeper Illaoi
   -Spectral hands similar to those in the new Galio's Q animation coming up from the ground
   -Meshes with her theme arguably better than Elderwood, as the hands are dragging you to the underworld.
-Warden Illaoi
   -Not sure how to describe the tentacles on this one, look at the picture for a good idea
   -The concept that she is protecting something and fighting for good could be a cool spin on her current lore, and the particle effects look great.
-Marauder Illaoi
   -Axes on chains instead of tentacles
   -Personally I think this would be the least likely but it still looks dope.

Overall, the Elderwood and Gatekeeper ones are highlights for me, and I would love to see them come to fruition.
Holy those skin concepts look epic!!!! I'd lave to see those on the Rift.

**Pool Party Illaoi?** 
Has a beach ball as a weapon that squeaks (through loss of air) whenever she hits someone with it. Q would be a giant pool noodle crashing down on someone - same with her tentacles. W would be the usual squeak. E would rip someone from their body, causing the blue watery figure to stand before Illaoi. A shark would start circling the spirit while playing the jaws theme. If the target leaves beyond range, the shark bursts from the ground and eats the spirit. R would make Illaoi divebomb into a pool of water before emerging with a massive amount of pool noodles to whack enemies with!

**EDIT:** When the pool noodles are no longer active, they attempt to camouflage by turning into coconut trees perhaps? Idol could be a giant coconut? She might be dressed up in a Hawaiian-theme get up, similar to others of the same theme like Lee Sin and Leona.
This is simply genius but most likely will end up as a 1350 rp or even as a 1850 rp skin from all the necessary texture changes added to the additional features

Ah that's true, sorry I might have missed it but was the price range supposed to be kept as low as possible when coming up with ideas? If so, then perhaps:

**Worldbreaker Illaoi:**
Same model and everything, only some colour re-textures to match the Worldbreaker skin line. Might change her model slightly to give it a more Aztec-appearance.

I dont think the price range matters i was just saying the particles necessary to make your skin idea could very possibly result in a legendary skin. By all means riot is happy if the price is up xD more win yknow
Haha many a summoner has fallen prey to high-price skins that look flashy - myself included. Just a new skin concept for Illaoi in general would be amazing.

One that was hinted at is Dreadnova/ Alien Queen Illaoi.
Basically how the giant tentacle from Dreadnova GP backing looks exactly like an Illoai tentacle.

Deep Terror with a more abyssal theme is the first that comes to mind. With gold being such a prominent colour of hers a Shuriman-themed skin might work, but I'm unsure what her tentacles would be replaced by, scorpion stingers maybe? And of course we need Dunkmaster Illaoi summoning basketball nets.
Ursula from the Little Mermaid, or something similar. Could be fun.
I've said it before, and I'll say it again: targonian Illaoi. Make her an aspect, make her abilities have a celestial theme, and you've got yourself a top-notch skin.
Maybe an artist skin for Illaoi.

Said it in another thread, but a ''chic'' Illaoi would be really fun to see, and would be such a contrast with her basic skin and character that it almost makes sense. She'd have a dress, high heels, pretty hairdo, and use a suitcase as a weapon.
